rules_text:
When Jenna Wilder enters or is turned face up, you may conjure three cards named Jenna Wilder, Timewinder and shuffle them into your library. 
Whenever you cast another spell that shares a name with Jenna Wilder, draw two cards.
special_text:
First mate – Your starting deck doesn't contain blue cards. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
When Jenna Wilder enters or is turned face up, you may conjure three cards named Jenna Wilder, Timewinder and shuffle them into your library. 
Whenever you cast another spell that shares a name with Jenna Wilder, draw two cards.
